articles.title: Kim Jong Un Again Guides Fire of New Type Large-caliber Multiple Rocket Launching System
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Again Guides Fire of New Type Large-caliber Multiple Rocket Launching System
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, again guided the fire of the new type large-caliber multiple rocket launching system.
					 He took an observation post with the officials accompanying him before giving an order to start the fire.
					
					 Watching the results of the fire, he expressed great satisfaction over the perfect accuracy of rockets. He highly praised once again the officials, scientists and technicians in the field of defence science and munitions factories for successfully manufacturing the system which is of great strategic importance in remarkably increasing the capability of the KPA to mount a precision attack on the enemies' targets in the operational theater in the southern part of Korea.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that they would bring the greatest heyday in the development of national defence science this year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held by steadily intensifying the work for developing new Juche-based weapons of Korean style, true to the WPK's idea of attaching importance to national defence science and technology, before having a photo taken with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Army General Ri Myong Su, chief of the KPA General Staff, Army Col. General Yun Tong Hyon, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil and Kim Jong Sik, vice department directors of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to October 3 Factory under KPA Navy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to October 3 Factory under KPA Navy
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the October 3 Factory under KPA Navy Unit 597.
					 Enjoying the panoramic view of the factory, he said that it has been so drastically face-lifted that its appearance last year could no longer be found. It is an icon and standard in the nation's field of ship repair, he added.
					
					 He went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 Noting that the factory today would be unthinkable without the meticulous guidance and care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he underscored the need for the factory to effectively conduct education in the exploits performed by the great leaders and the Party among its employees through the successfully built room for the education in the revolutionary history and room dedicated to the history.
					
					 He looked round the weak-current apparatus work-team, engine repair shop, processing shop, test operation ground, dock, wharf and other places of the factory to learn in detail about its modernization.
					
					 The updating of the factory provided a solid material and technical foundation for repairing any warship in a short span of time, he noted.
					
					 He said that the dock was successfully remodeled so that it may ensure the safest and most convenient repair of warships and the wharf and embankment projects were carried out in an impeccable manner.
					
					 A clear line of distinction between the area for production and that for workers' living was drawn to provide the workers with the best working and living conditions and various cultural and welfare facilities, sporting ground and dwelling houses for employees were successfully built to keep harmony with the coastal area, he said, adding that it looks like a health resort.
					
					 He gave precious instructions to be implemented by the factory to manage and operate, noting that the factory has a very important role to play in developing the Juche-oriented naval force.
					
					 He said that the remodeling of the factory as a modern one by our own efforts of which we can be proud was a striking demonstration of the indomitable fighting spirit and validity of the cause of the army and people of the DPRK who are waging an offensive despite difficulties and trials while resolutely smashing the desperate moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle Korean socialism.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the officials and workers of the factory would make positive contributions to developing the Juche-oriented naval force, noting that the defense of the territorial waters means national defense in Korea surrounded by the seas on three sides.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Myong Su, Yun Tong Hyon, Jo Yong Won, Kim Jong Sik and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Will Be Held
articles.content:
30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Will Be Held
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival will be held here to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The festival will bring together national and international concours winners, famous art troupes, dancing troupes and circuses of foreign countries and overseas Korean art troupes and Korean artistes.
					
					 The festival will inspire the service personnel and people advancing toward a final victory, and record a brilliant chapter in the history of the festival.

articles.title: Members of Russian Embassy Visit National Gifts Exhibition House
articles.content:
Members of Russian Embassy Visit National Gifts Exhibition House
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and members of his embassy here visited the National Gifts Exhibition House on Tuesday on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 At the general review room, they paid tribute to the statues of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the exhibition house was impeccably built into the eternal treasure of the Korean nation, the guests looked round the gifts presented to the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu by Koreans in the north, the south and overseas.

articles.title: DPRK People Determined to Wipe out Provokers
articles.content:
DPRK People Determined to Wipe out Provokers
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The DPPK people are burning with the surging hatred against the U.S. imperialists and south Korean group of traitors, upon receiving the Mar. 16 special statement issued by the DPRK government, political parties and organizations to denounce the anti-DPRK war drills being staged in south Korea.
					 The dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is the dearest for all the Korean people, said Ri Yong Sik, chief secretary of Phyongchon District Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 We should never allow such reckless moves of the provokers to go on.
					
					 Now is the very time for our army and people to clearly show the pack of mad dogs what the real sacred war will be.
					
					 All the people in the district will carry on the ongoing 70-day campaign in the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and once ordered, will turn out in the all-out war to exterminate them.
					
					 Mun Hye Gyong, chairwoman of the Kangnam County Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, said:
					
					 All members of the women's union are replete with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the country, which was displayed by those women of a village on the bank of the Nam during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors should be well aware that inconceivable are the DPRK without its leadership and the earth without the DPRK.
					
					 Choe Chol Jin, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said:
					
					 A club is fit for a mad dog. 
					
					 The provokers should be clearly mindful of millions of human bullets and bombs of the DPRK aiming at annihilating them.
					
					 We will mercilessly wipe out the enemies, if they dare show a slightest sign of moves to harm our supreme leadership.

articles.title: Digital Chart on Valuable Minerals Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Digital Chart on Valuable Minerals Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The central group for the survey of mineral resources under the Ministry of State Natural Resources Development in the DPRK has recently produced a new digital chart on valuable minerals.
					 This chart, a reading program, helps search and control the survey data on a nationwide scale and adopt prospecting strategy and tactics on a scientific basis by making a unified control of the country's underground resources.
					
					 The program, developed in cooperation with the Global Environmental Information Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, makes it possible to ensure the rapid scientific prognosis of valuable mineral deposits throughout the country, Kang Song Il, chief engineer of the group, told KCNA.

articles.title: Might of Ideological Campaign in DPRK
articles.content:
Might of Ideological Campaign in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The people in the DPRK are now conducting the 70-day campaign to significantly greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It reminds one of the days when another 70-day campaign was launched in Juche 63 (1974) under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il. This campaign made a breakthrough in smoothly carrying out the Six-Year Plan of the national economy before the 30th anniversary of the WPK (October 10, 1975).
					
					 In fact, it was results of an ideological campaign initiated by Kim Jong Il to arouse all the people to working great feats.
					
					 Under his guidance, at least 10,000 officials were dispatched to thousands of major production units and 50-odd art troupes to worksites throughout the country to give full play to the working people's spiritual strength. Meanwhile, media widely introduced news about achievements in production and construction.
					
					 Such ideological campaign resulted in the rise of production 1.7 times higher, bringing about radical change in the people's ideological and moral life.

articles.title: KCNA Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- U.S. experts on Korean affairs and foreign media are becoming increasingly vocal urging the U.S. administration to opt for concluding a peace treaty with the DPRK in order to find a solution to the issue of the Korean peninsula.
					 Benette Ramberg, policy researcher at the agency for political and military affairs under the former Bush administration, said in his commentary contributed to Reuters that north Korea is a nuclear power both in name and reality, urging the U.S. to recognize its status as an irreversible nuclear power and hold a dialogue with it.
					
					 Joel Wit, former official for Korean affairs of the U.S. Department of State, asserted that the U.S. should "pursue a compromise proposal by responding to north Korea's offer for concluding the peace treaty as the recent resolution on sanctions would not go down with the latter. He added that it is possible for the U.S. to discuss and issue an official declaration on putting an end to the Korean War at the first phase of the negotiations for concluding the peace treaty and discuss and press ahead with specific measures including a halt to the U.S.-south Korea annual joint military exercises and the removal of the Military Demarcation Line at the next phase.
					
					 Media including the U.S. website Reddit said: North Korea is steadily improving the capability of its nuclear weapons but the U.S. cannot strike them. The U.S. failed in its test for intercepting north Korea's missiles. In the final analysis, negotiations are the only option for defusing north Korea's nuclear and missile threats.
					
					 A director of the Chinese Foundation for the International Studies noted that it is the most pressing and urgent task to prevent the outbreak of a war on the Korean peninsula. To this end, it is necessary to put an end to the truce on the peninsula and conclude a peace treaty.
					
					 These are the strong assertions that the U.S. should not persist in its megalomaniac quixotic policy but boldly recognize the status of the DPRK as a nuclear power, opt for improving the relations with it and discuss the issue of concluding the peace treaty with it.
					
					 The DPRK had access to H-bomb to safeguard the sovereignty and right of the country and nation to exist from the U.S. aggressive policy and nuclear blackmail and threat which have lasted for the past several decades, thus proudly joining the advanced ranks of nuclear powers.  Nothing can disable its nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 The DPRK is bolstering up its merciless striking capability at multi-phases with increased speed to cope with the ever-escalating U.S. moves for a war of aggression. This is the reality which the world people witness at present.
					
					 The U.S. is busy staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises with huge troops and preemptive nuclear offensive weapons deployed in south Korea and the vicinity of the Korean peninsula. This madcap saber-rattling does not show off its aggressive force but betrays its fear of the tremendous military muscle of the DPRK.
					
					 The ceaseless military exercises being staged by the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces under various codenames in south Korea are the basic factor of a war on the peninsula.
					
					 There is no guarantee that such drills will not lead to an all-out war on the peninsula. In case a war breaks out, it will quickly spill over to a world war and nuclear war among nuclear powers.
					
					 Disregarding this hard fact, the U.S. is still crying out for someone's "dismantling of nuclear weapons". This is a way of thinking little short of escape from reality.
					
					 As long as the U.S. does not abandon such way of thinking, there can be no progress in settling the issue of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Now that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK persistently threatens the latter's existence and both sides are still technically at war, the U.S. assertion that peace can settle on the peninsula only when the latter unilaterally dismantles its nuclear weapons, to begin with, is sheer sophism understandable to no one.
					
					 The world will only see the DPRK's tremendous nuclear deterrent growing stronger on the peninsula unless the U.S. does not roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK including joint military rehearsals.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Stop Subsidies to Korean School
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Stop Subsidies to Korean School 
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the mayor of Nagoya City of Japan asserted that it would not appropriate some of subsidies to the Korean primary school in Nagoya that was included in the new year budget. He added this measure was taken because of "north Korea's nuclear test and missile launch".
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary terms this an act of those who are obsessed with the hostility toward the DPRK, an act stemmed from the crude and cunning Japanese way of thinking. 
					
					 It is quite just from the ethical viewpoint for Japan to subsidize Korean schools as it committed indelible hideous crimes against the Korean nation in the past.
					
					 Yet, this country goes vulgar, giving bruises to the minds of children under an unjustifiable reason. This is a mockery and an insult to the entire Korean nation.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' moves to suspend the subsidies are prompted by their sinister intention to stop the national education, inject the idea against the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) into the society of Japan and thus obliterate Chongryon and tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should clearly understand the soaring hatred of the army and people of the DPRK against Japan, stop going reckless and discontinue at once the unreasonable crackdown upon Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan and the moves of suspending subsidies to the Korean school.

articles.title: Park Regime Is to Blame for Touch-and-Go Situation on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Park Regime Is to Blame for Touch-and-Go Situation on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday insists in an article that traitor Park Geun Hye is to blame for the prevailing touch-and-go situation as she ruined the inter-Korean relations with her policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the north and is going wild to realize the ambition for the invasion of the north.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 She slapped harsh "sanctions on the north" and is running amuck with hysterical war games against the north under the pretext of its measures for bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for self-defense and its satellite launch for peaceful purposes. These bring to light her vicious nature.
					
					 Park is going helter-skelter to realize the "yusin" dictator's dream of invading the north in her time which the dictator failed to do.
					
					 Innocent south Korean people will be subject to misfortune due to Park who is utterly ignorant of the military affairs.
					
					 South Korean public vent their rage and grievance that they are at unease due to the reckless saber-rattling which the old war servitor is staging with outsiders.
					
					 A war is sure to break out if she is left intact as she is steeped in a wild dream of invasion of the north to the marrow of her bones.
					
					 It is the only way out for the south Korean people to eliminate the war hysteric of Chongwadae.

articles.title: S. Korean Airmen Stage Attack Drills Targeting Key Facilities of DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Airmen Stage Attack Drills Targeting Key Facilities of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet air force Monday conducted large-scale attack formation drill aimed to mount a precision attack on the key facilities of the DPRK as part of reckless Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military drills kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The puppet warmongers were hell-bent on the drills dropping JDAM in succession on the core facilities of the DPRK by F-15K, light assault aircraft, etc. and airlifting special units by C-130Hs which flew over simulated north areas being escorted by FA-50s. It was reported that it is the first time for the C-130Hs to be involved in the attack formation drill of the puppet air force.

articles.title: Corruption Rife at Defense Security Command of S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Corruption Rife at Defense Security Command of S. Korean Puppet Army 
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed recently that corruption is rife at the Defense Security Command of the south Korean puppet army, sparking off public uproar.
					 A lot of agents of the Defense Security Command and its affiliated units were involved in corruption, according to the investigation into them made at the end of last year.
					
					 Alarming corruption was manifested in the frontline units, in particular.
					
					 More than three percent of the agents deserve legal actions for their involvement in sex scandals, leakage of military secrets, maltreatment through abuse of power, etc.

articles.title: Unity of South Korean Public Called for
articles.content:
Unity of South Korean Public Called for
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A poem composed by journalist Ri Jong Sop "Let the people get united" was posted on the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo on March 17.
					 The poem called upon the south Korean public to get united in the struggle against the outsiders, separatist forces and traitors.
					
					 The unity guarantees the building of an independent and equality-based society and nation's peace and prosperity of the world, the poem stressed.

articles.title: Japan Gets Pronounced in Moves to Grab Tok Islets
articles.content:
Japan Gets Pronounced in Moves to Grab Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Japan gets ever more pronounced in its moves to tamper with history, pursuant to its scenario to grab Tok Islets.
					 On March 18 the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan confirmed and made public the results of screening the textbooks to be used at schools in 2017.
					
					 Tok Islets are designated as "part of the territory of Japan" in the 27 kinds of history textbooks out of 35 kinds of textbooks dealing with social subjects that passed the screening.
					
					 The above-said controversial textbooks account for 77 percent of all the textbooks or 8 percent increase over those two years back.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Act of Treachery under Fire by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Act of Treachery under Fire by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released a statement on March 17 to denounce such act of treachery committed by the Park Geun Hye group as reaching an agreement at the negotiations with Japan on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The statement termed the "agreement" reached by the Park group with Japan over the above-said issue a humiliating act as it disregarded the will of the victims of the sexual slavery and lacked Japan's honest apology and reparation for the crime.
					
					 It called for conducting a positive movement to nullify the said "agreement".

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Norway
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Norway
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Fredrikstad, Norway on March 17. 
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to arrange diverse political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: DPRK's Self-Defensive Measures Supported in Bangladesh
articles.content:
DPRK's Self-Defensive Measures Supported in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Bangladesh on March 12 to oppose the on-going war games of the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime and support the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK.
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, and other speakers condemned the hostile acts of the U.S. and its followers to encroach upon the inviolable dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 They stressed that the Korean people will surely win the final victory, sending full support to all the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK.
					
					 A statement was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime immediately stop the reckless military exercises.
					
					 Persistent tension on the Korean peninsula is mainly attributable to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the south Korean puppet regime's ambition for "unification through absorption", it said, and went on:
					
					 It is a legitimate right of a sovereign state and a fair exercise of sovereignty that the DPRK bolsters up its nuclear deterrent to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 The statement extended support and solidarity to the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK to protect the sovereignty and vital right of the country and nation.

articles.title: KPA General Staff's Statement Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
KPA General Staff's Statement Supported by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea expressed support for a statement of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The organizations said in their joint statement on March 13:
					
					 The General Staff of the KPA, upon the authorization of the Supreme Command, declared that the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army will counter the enemy's anti-DPRK landing drills aimed at "storming Pyongyang" with an operation to liberate the whole of south Korea including Seoul, and the enemy's "high-density strike" tactics with ultra-precision blitzkrieg of Korean style.
					
					 The KPA's decisive counterattack will lead to national and social emancipation of the south Korean people and national reunification.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers were seriously warned.
					
					 The end of the U.S. imperialist colonial rule over south Korea and the treacherous regime of south Korea is drawing near.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Moves against DPRK Condemned by Lebanese Organizations
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Moves against DPRK Condemned by Lebanese Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The Lebanon Federation of Workers and the Lebanese Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea issued a joint statement on March 15 denouncing the U.S. for masterminding a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK and being hell-bent on its joint military exercises with south Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We resolutely denounce the U.S. for not only fabricating the unreasonable "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK by abusing the name of the UN Security Council but also breeding all kinds of plots against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is staging aggressive war drills in collusion with south Korea and thus escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula as it was extremely frightened by the DPRK's first successful H-bomb test.
					
					 We criticize the U.S. hostile policy and moves for aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 We support the Korean people's struggle for firmly defending the country's sovereignty and dignity.

articles.title: Nigerian Political Party Calls for Halt to U.S.-S. Korea War Drills
articles.content:
Nigerian Political Party Calls for Halt to U.S.-S. Korea War Drills
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria made public a statement on March 15 denouncing the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					 The statement said that the international community was greatly concerned about the recent unstable situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula. It went on:
					
					 We support the DPRK's principled stand on the war drills of the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 The joint military drills targeting the DPRK are definitely drills of aggression.
					
					 The war games may trigger off a new world war as they are most dangerous maneuvers that can lead to a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Anybody who wants global peace and security should properly discern who wishes peace and who pursues a war.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants dialogue with the DPRK and peace on the Korean peninsula, it should stop the war drills.

articles.title: Russian Organization Wishes Korean People More Successes in Developing Ultra-modern Technology
articles.content:
Russian Organization Wishes Korean People More Successes in Developing Ultra-modern Technology
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- We wish the Korean people more successes in developing ultra-modern technology for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					 The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said this in a statement on March 15.
					
					 The statement extended warm congratulations to the Korean people upon succeeding in developing the heat-resisting materials for rocket by their own efforts and technology and realizing the local production of them.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 It's marvelous to see the DPRK making remarkable scientific and technological successes despite the severest economic sanctions.
					
					 The Korean people are countering the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces' moves for provoking a nuclear war with their general offensive of the scientific and technical revolution.
					
					 We support the DPRK's policy of attaching importance to science and technology that is dealing a deadly blow at the enemy with its scientific and technical revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Iran
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was published in booklet by the Hadian Publishing House of Iran on March 17.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life of loving the country and people. It also clarifies the important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Iceland
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Iceland
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Reykjavik, Iceland on March 17.
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary history and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un vuelve a dirigir tiro de lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado de grueso caliber
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un vuelve a dirigir tiro de lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado de grueso calibre
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, volvio a dirigir en el terreno el tiro de nuevo lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado de grueso calibre.
					El Mariscal tomo el puesto de vigilancia junto con sus acompanantes y dio la orden de iniciar el tiro de lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado de grueso calibre de largo alcance.
					
					Tras ver el resultado de tiro, el Mariscal se mostro muy satisfecho de alta efectividad de arma y evaluo otra vez  los meritos de los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de ciencias belicas de defensa nacional y la fabrica de materiales belicos, quienes produjeron el sistema de excelente arma que tiene gran significacion estrategica en  intensificar mas que nunca la capacidad de ataque preciso del EPC a los blancos enemigos en la zona de operacion de  la parte surcoreana.
					
					Les expreso una gran esperanza y conviccion de que en pleno acato a la idea del partido de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas de defensa nacional, sigan librando con dinamismo las labores de desarrollo de nuevas armas a nuestro estilo para abrir una era dorada del desarrollo de ciencias de defensa nacional en el presente ano en que se convocara el VII Congreso del PTC y tomo fotos de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Yun Tong Hyon, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y los subjefes de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil y Kim Jong Sik.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica 3 de Octubre adscrita a Unidad 597 de marina de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica 3 de Octubre adscrita a Unidad 597 de marina de EPC
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las labores de la Fabrica 3 de Octubre adscrita a la Unidad 597 de la marina del EPC, acondicionada excelentemente como modelo de la fabrica de reparacion de barcos del pais.
					Mirando el panorama de la fabrica, el Mariscal dijo que se ha cambiado totalmente su fisonomia y agrego que fue preparado un modelo en la rama de reparacion de barco de nuestro pais.
					
					El recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Subrayo que no se puede pensar en la fabrica de hoy al margen de la minuciosa direccion y la atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y enfatizo la necesidad de organizar con escrupulosidad entre los empleados la educacion en las hazanas de direccion de los grandes Lideres y el partido.
					
					Pasando revista a la brigada de corriente debil, el taller de reparacion de motor, el de elaboracion, el campo de manejo de  prueba, el dique, el muelle y otros lugares, hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de modernizacion.
					
					Destaco que gracias a la modernizacion de la fabrica se ha preparado una firme base material y tecnica capaz de reparar en corto tiempo cualesquier buques de guerra.
					
					Senalo que el dique fue remodelado tan excelentemente que puede reparar mas estable y comodamente los buques de guerra, y son perfectos el muelle y la obra de proteccion de la costa.
					
					Refirio que para ofrecer a los obreros las excelentes condiciones de trabajo y vida, fueron divididas claramente el reparto de produccion y el de vida y construidos magnificamente los establecimientos culturales y de servicio publico, el lugar de deportes, etc. y anadio que fueron edificadas bien como si fueran casas de reposo las viviendas de los empleados conforme a las caracteristicas de la zona costera.
					
					Al puntualizar la importancia del deber de la Fabrica en el fortalecimiento de las autoctonas fuerzas navales, dio las instrucciones preciosas necesarias a la administracion y gestion de la fabrica.
					
					Dijo con enfasis que la edificacion por propias fuerzas de la moderna fabrica digno de enorgullecerse sirve de una muestra nitida del temple y espiritu de lucha indoblegable y la justeza de la causa, de los militares y los civiles que libran una ofensiva contra las dificultades frustrando tajantemente las maniobras persistentes de los imperialistas yanquis y sus fuerzas lacayunas, destinadas a aplastar el socialismo coreano.
					
					Enfatizando que en nuestro pais rodeado de mares por tres lados la defensa de los mares territoriales es precisamente la defensa de la patria, expreso una gran esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y los obreros de la fabrica contribuyan activamente al desarrollo de las autoctonas fuerzas navales.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Ri Myong Su, Yun Tong Hyon, Jo Yong Won, Kim Jong Sik y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Miembros de embajada rusa en RPDC visitan Exposición Estatal Permanente de Regalos
articles.content:
Miembros de embajada rusa en RPDC visitan Exposición Estatal Permanente de Regalos
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 67º aniversario de la concertación del Acuerdo sobre la Cooperación Económica y Cultural entre la República Popular Democrática de Corea y la Federación Rusa, el embajador Alexandr Matsegora y otros miembros de la embajada rusa en la RPDC visitaron el día 22 la Exposición Estatal Permanente de Regalos.
					En el hall principal ellos rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre la exposición erguida maravillosamente como patrimonio eterno de la nación coreana, los huéspedes rusos recorrieron los presentes obsequiados a los grandes hombres del monte Paektu por los habitantes coreanos, compatriotas en ultramar y surcoreanos.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe abandonar politica de confrontacion anti-RPDC, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe abandonar politica de confrontacion anti-RPDC, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los especialistas de asuntos coreanos de Estados Unidos y los medios de prensa de varios paises demandan que la administracion norteamericana debe concertar un convenio de la paz con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a fin de solucionar el problema de la Peninsula Coreana.
					  Benette Ramberg, ex investigador de politica de la agencia para los asuntos politicos y militares perteneciente a la administracion de Bush insistio en un comentario insertado en la agencia noticiera Reuters en que el Norte de Corea es, al pie de la letra, la potencia nuclear, por tanto EE.UU. debe reconocer la incambiable posicion de este como pais poseedor de las armas nucleares y realizar el dialogo.
					
					  Joel Wit, ex oficial para los asuntos coreanos del Departamento de Estado norteamericano dijo que la resolucion de sancion recien aprobada tambien no surtira ningun efecto en cuanto al Norte de Corea, razon por la cual hay que perseguir el proyecto de conciliacion aceptando la demanda del Norte de Corea de concertar el convenio de paz.
					
					  Prosiguio que seran posibles argumentar y promover las medidas detalladas incluyendo el problema de discutir y publicar la declaracion oficial sobre el fin de la guerra  coreana en la primera etapa de las negociaciones para el convenio de paz y, en la segunda, el de cesar los anuales ejercicios militares conjuntos de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea y eliminar la linea de demarcacion militar.
					
					  La pagina web de Internet estadounidense Reddit y otras publicaciones estimaron: el Norte de Corea mejora constantemente la capacidad de las armas nucleares, pero EE.UU. no puede golpearlas. Fracaso tambien en la prueba para interceptar los misiles del Norte de Corea. Al fin y al cabo, el unico remedio para extirpar la amenaza de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte de Corea reside en realizar las negociaciones.
					
					Un director de la Fundacion China de Estudios Internacionales subrayo que prevenir el estallido de la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana es la mas apremiante y urgente tarea, para lo cual es necesario poner punto final al estado de armisticio en la Peninsula Coreana y concertar el convenio de paz.
					
					Todos los argumentos significan que EE.UU. debe reconocer audazmente la posicion de la RPDC como potencia nuclear sin insistir en la megalomana politica a estilo de Don Quijote, optar el camino de la mejora de las relaciones con la RPDC y deliberar el problema de la concertacion del convenio de paz RPDC-EE.UU.
					
					Hoy en dia, la RPDC poseyo la bomba de hidrogeno para defender la soberania y el derecho a vivir del pais y la nacion desde la politica agresiva y el chantaje y amenaza nucleares de EE.UU. que se han aumentado durante decenios, y entro dignamente en la fila delantera de los paises poseedores de las armas nucleares.
					
					El disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC no pueden destruirlo con nada.
					
					Cuanto mas se fortalecen las maniobras de la guerra agresiva de EE.UU., tanto mas se intensifica rapida y escalonadamente nuestra capacidad de golpe implacable.  Esto es la realidad que ven y sienten personalmente los pueblos del mundo.
					
					Los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16 que EE.UU. libra con frenesi tras introducir en el Sur de Corea y los alrededores de la Peninsula Coreana los enormes efectivos militares y las armas de ataque preventivo nuclear, no manifiestan el caracter demostrativo y amenazante de la banda de agresores sino comprueban evidentemente el potente poderio militar de la RPDC.
					
					Los simulacros que EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana desarrollan constantemente bajo distintos rotulos en la Peninsula Coreana, devienen la causa principal que trae el nubarron de guerra.
					
					No hay ninguna garantia de que dichos entrenamientos no traigan la guerra total en la Peninsula Coreana y en este caso, ella se extendera facilmente a la guerra mundial y la guerra nuclear entre las potencias nucleares.
					
					Pero EE.UU., despreciandolo, todavia aboga por la "anulacion nuclear" de alguien. Esto es el modo de pensamiento que evade la realidad.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. no se libere de tal pensamiento, nunca habra el avance en la solucion del problema de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En actualidad, sigue la politica hostil de EE.UU. que amenaza nuestra existencia, y la RPDC y EE.UU. estan todavia en la beligerancia. Bajo tales circunstancias, no puede persuadir a nadie la insistencia de este imperio yanqui en que si la RPDC renuncia unilateralmente las armas nucleares, podra llegar la paz.
					
					Si EE.UU. no abandona todas sus politicas hostiles anti-RPDC, inclusive los simulacros militares conjuntos, causa raigal de la agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, sera intensificado mas el disuasivo nuclear ilimitado de la RPDC.
